description: Retrieves information about a configuration profile.

parameters.name: ApplicationId
parameters.description: The ID of the application that includes the configuration profile you want to get.

parameters.name: ConfigurationProfileId
parameters.description: The ID of the configuration profile that you want to get.

nested_items.name: Name
nested_items.description: The name of the configuration profile.

nested_items.name: LocationUri
nested_items.description: The URI location of the configuration.

nested_items.name: RetrievalRoleArn
nested_items.description: The ARN of an IAM role with permission to access the configuration at the specified LocationUri.

nested_items.name: Validators
nested_items.description: A list of methods for validating the configuration.

nested_items.name: Type
nested_items.description: AppConfig supports validators of type JSON_SCHEMA and LAMBDA.

nested_items.name: Content
nested_items.description: Either the JSON Schema content or the Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of an Lambda function.

nested_items.name: Type
nested_items.description: The type of configurations contained in the profile. AppConfig supports feature flags and freeform configurations. We recommend you create feature flag configurations to enable or disable new features and freeform configurations to distribute configurations to an application. When calling this API, enter one of the following values for Type:

nested_items.name: KmsKeyArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name of the Key Management Service key to encrypt new configuration data versions in the AppConfig hosted configuration store. This attribute is only used for hosted configuration types. To encrypt data managed in other configuration stores, see the documentation for how to specify an KMS key for that particular service.

nested_items.name: KmsKeyIdentifier
nested_items.description: The Key Management Service key identifier (key ID, key alias, or key ARN) provided when the resource was created or updated.
